titles.title: To establish an Energy Policy Council to develop a National Energy Plan and monitor the implementation thereof, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/22/2008--Introduced. Establishes an Energy Policy Council within the Executive Office of the President to develop a National Energy Plan and a plan for comprehensive federal departmental reform to eliminate wasteful spending and overlapping programs, including by establishing a consolidated entity to be known as the Department of Energy Policy.
